description:
doc/progs: skip cgo1 and cgo2 on freebsd

FreeBSD's srandom has a different signature to darwin/linux.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5795067/diff/2001/doc/progs/run
File doc/progs/run (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5795067/diff/2001/doc/progs/run#newcode40
doc/progs/run:40: if [[ "$goos" == "freebsd" ]]; then
You only need one set of square brackets.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e9413993dcbe ***

doc/progs: skip cgo1 and cgo2 on freebsd

FreeBSD's srandom has a different signature to darwin/linux.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 5795067: doc/progs: skip cgo1 and cgo2 on freebsd
